rules.description: Left Command becomes a navigation layer

manipulators.description: Hold: activate layer temporarily | Tap: send BackSpace
LEFT HAND - Top row: È - Select to beginning of document
LEFT HAND - Top row: Y - Go to beginning of document
LEFT HAND - Top row: O - Go to end of document
LEFT HAND - Top row: W - Select to end of document
LEFT HAND - Top row: B - F2
LEFT HAND - Middle row: CapsLock - Delete
LEFT HAND - Middle row: A - Select paragraph up
LEFT HAND - Middle row: S - Up arrow
LEFT HAND - Middle row: D - Down arrow
LEFT HAND - Middle row: F - Select paragraph down
LEFT HAND - Middle row: G - F12 (Go to definition)
LEFT HAND - Bottom row: Ê - Duplicate line up
LEFT HAND - Bottom row: E - Move line up
LEFT HAND - Bottom row: À - Move line down
LEFT HAND - Bottom row: J - Duplicate line down
LEFT HAND - Bottom row: Comma - New line below
RIGHT HAND - Top row: Y - Select to beginning of line
RIGHT HAND - Top row: G - Select previous word
RIGHT HAND - Top row: H - Select previous character
RIGHT HAND - Top row: C - Select next character
RIGHT HAND - Top row: X - Select next word
RIGHT HAND - Top row: Open bracket - Select to end of line
RIGHT HAND - Middle row: V - Move window to left monitor
RIGHT HAND - Middle row: S - Previous word
RIGHT HAND - Middle row: N - Left arrow
RIGHT HAND - Middle row: T - Right arrow
RIGHT HAND - Middle row: R - Next word
RIGHT HAND - Middle row: Q - Move window to right monitor
RIGHT HAND - Bottom row: M - Maximize window
RIGHT HAND - Bottom row: D - Go to the beginning of line
RIGHT HAND - Bottom row: L - Move window to left
RIGHT HAND - Bottom row: P - Move window to right
RIGHT HAND - Bottom row: Apostrophe - Go to the end of line
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 1 -> F1 (send fn+F1 when system F-keys are media)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 1 -> F1 (send F1 when system F-keys are standard)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 2 -> F2 (send fn+F2 when system F-keys are media)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 2 -> F2 (send F2 when system F-keys are standard)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 3 -> F3 (send fn+F3 when system F-keys are media)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 3 -> F3 (send F3 when system F-keys are standard)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 4 -> F4 (send fn+F4 when system F-keys are media)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 4 -> F4 (send F4 when system F-keys are standard)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 5 -> F5 (send fn+F5 when system F-keys are media)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 5 -> F5 (send F5 when system F-keys are standard)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 6 -> F6 (send fn+F6 when system F-keys are media)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 6 -> F6 (send F6 when system F-keys are standard)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 7 -> F7 (send fn+F7 when system F-keys are media)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 7 -> F7 (send F7 when system F-keys are standard)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 8 -> F8 (send fn+F8 when system F-keys are media)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 8 -> F8 (send F8 when system F-keys are standard)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 9 -> F9 (send fn+F9 when system F-keys are media)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 9 -> F9 (send F9 when system F-keys are standard)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 0 -> F10 (send fn+F10 when system F-keys are media)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + 0 -> F10 (send F10 when system F-keys are standard)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + hyphen -> F11 (send fn+F11 when system F-keys are media)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + hyphen -> F11 (send F11 when system F-keys are standard)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + equal_sign -> F12 (send fn+F12 when system F-keys are media)
NUMBER ROW: Layer + equal_sign -> F12 (send F12 when system F-keys are standard)

rules.description: Spacebar: Left Command when held, Spacebar when tapped
Tab: Cmd+Tab when tapped, Fn when held
Left Shift: Copy when tapped, Shift when held
Fn: Paste when tapped, Left Command when held
Left Control: Cut when tapped, Left Control when held
Left Option: Delete when tapped, Command + Shift when held
Right Command: Tab when tapped, Right Option (AltGr) when held
Right Command + Left Option: move one word right then delete one word left
